decks.notes: This Boros Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and utilizing powerful spells like Goblin Bombardment and Galvanic Discharge to control the board. The deck also includes cards like Guide of Souls and Ajani, Nacatl Pariah to give the creatures additional buffs and abilities. Jegantha, the Wellspring serves as a companion to provide additional synergy and options. The deck aims to be proactive and fast-paced, putting pressure on the opponent early and maintaining dominance throughout the game. Overall, it is a versatile and aggressive deck with strong synergy between its cards.

This Mono Black Control deck focuses on utilizing powerful creatures and removal spells to control the board and disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck includes cards like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Soul Spike to generate card advantage and pressure the opponent. With a mix of creature removal spells like Fatal Push and hand disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Inquisition of Kozilek, this deck aims to establish control early and maintain it throughout the game. The inclusion of cards like Necrodominance and The Meathook Massacre provide additional versatility and win conditions.

The Boros Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and direct damage spells, utilizing cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah, Amped Raptor, and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury. The deck also includes support cards like Arena of Glory and Static Prison to control the board and protect your creatures. By maintaining a fast-paced, aggressive strategy, the deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain momentum throughout the game to secure a swift victory.

This Mardu Aggro deck focuses on aggressive creatures like Amped Raptor and Ocelot Pride, supported by removal spells like Fatal Push and Thoughtseize. The deck also includes powerful planeswalkers like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah to help maintain board control. The inclusion of Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion allows for additional mana ramp and versatility. The deck aims to quickly overwhelm opponents with a mix of efficient creatures and disruption, backed up by a solid mana base and side options like Static Prison and Goblin Bombardment.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on fast-paced aggression and utilizing the companion Jegantha, the Wellspring for additional support. With a mix of powerful creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Amped Raptor, along with spells like Lightning Bolt and Galvanic Discharge for removal, the deck looks to overwhelm opponents quickly. Cards like Arena of Glory, Static Prison, and Blood Moon provide additional control elements to disrupt opponents' strategies. The deck aims to close out games swiftly before opponents have a chance to stabilize, showcasing the aggressive nature of the Boros archetype.

The deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells, utilizing a mix of creatures with haste and direct damage cards. It also includes ways to disrupt the opponent's game plan with cards like Static Prison and Containment Priest. The mana base allows for a consistent and efficient casting of spells, while the Companion Jegantha provides additional value and versatility. Overall, the deck aims to apply constant pressure and finish the game before the opponent can stabilize or recover.

This deck focuses on generating a large amount of mana quickly through rituals and mana-generating spells, with the goal of casting multiple spells in a single turn to deal a significant amount of damage to the opponent. It also includes cards that allow for card draw and recursion to continue the combo. The included creatures and planeswalkers provide additional support and utility to help the deck achieve its goal of overwhelming the opponent with a powerful combo.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game using a combination of counter spells, removal spells, and powerful enchantments like The One Ring and Leyline Binding. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy while generating card advantage with cards like Consign to Memory and Teferi, Time Raveler. The win condition of the deck revolves around utilizing powerful creatures like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury, and protecting them with spells like Force of Negation and Subtlety. The land base is carefully crafted to support a consistent mana base and provide utility with cards like Arena of Glory and Meticulous Archive.

The deck focuses on utilizing the combo potential of Underworld Breach, Emry, Lurker of the Loch, and Grinding Station to generate infinite loops and win the game quickly. It also includes powerful control elements like Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Unholy Heat to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The inclusion of Mishra's Bauble and Mox Amber allows for consistent card draw and mana acceleration, while cards like Thassa's Oracle and Boseiju, Who Endures provide alternate win conditions and protection against countermagic. Overall, the deck aims to assemble its combo pieces quickly and efficiently to secure victory.

This deck focuses on using Eldrazi creatures to control the game and ramp up mana quickly. The key strategy is to utilize cards like Kozilek's Command and Malevolent Rumble to control the board while also using ramp cards like Ancient Stirrings and Eldrazi Temple to quickly cast powerful creatures like Glaring Fleshraker and Basking Broodscale. The inclusion of The One Ring and Blade of the Bloodchief provides additional utility and power to the deck, making it a formidable force in Modern 1 vs 1 matchups.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on fast-paced aggression and maintaining pressure on the opponent. Utilizing cards like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Guide of Souls, the deck aims to quickly build up a board presence and deal damage efficiently. Additional support is provided through cards like Lightning Bolt and Goblin Bombardment, while Static Prison helps control the battlefield. The inclusion of Aether Hub and blood moon adds versatility to the mana base, allowing for smooth gameplay. The deck's strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of speed and power.

This deck focuses on utilizing cards that interact with the opponents' spells and disrupt their game plan while building up to powerful combo finishers. By not relying on lands, it aims to avoid common forms of disruption and smoothly execute its combo strategy. Key cards like Hydroelectric Specimen and Thundertrap Trainer provide value and control, while cards like Goblin Charbelcher and Lotus Bloom offer explosive win conditions. With a mix of counter spells, card draw, and combo pieces, this deck aims to outmaneuver opponents and secure victory through its unique playstyle.

The main concept of this deck is to use a combination of cards like Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Underworld Breach to generate infinite combos, allowing the player to cast spells from their graveyard repeatedly. This deck also utilizes artifacts like Mishra's Bauble and Urza's Saga to fuel its combo engine, while cards like Malevolent Rumble and Unholy Heat provide removal and disruption to control the game. The goal is to assemble the needed pieces quickly and efficiently to overwhelm the opponent with a powerful combo finish.

The deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly using Eldrazi Temple and other mana sources to play powerful Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn and Ulamog, the Defiler. Control elements such as Trinisphere and Ugin's Labyrinth help to disrupt the opponent's game plan. Through the Breach allows for cheating big creatures into play quickly, while cards like Kozilek's Command and Sowing Mycospawn provide additional value and flexibility. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with large, hard-to-deal-with threats and control the game until victory.

The deck focuses on fast and aggressive Eldrazi creatures, supported by various artifacts and enchantments to boost their power and provide additional control. The main strategy is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures like Basking Broodscale and Glaring Fleshraker, as well as powerful spells like Kozilek's Command and Malevolent Rumble. The deck also includes cards like Mishra's Bauble and Ancient Stirrings to help with card advantage and searching for key pieces. The mana base is carefully constructed to support the Eldrazi theme and ensure consistent casting of spells.
